sentences.sContent: Seven years later, through his work with Harold Eugene Edgerton of MIT, he made several photographic experiences of capturing sequences of actions using photoflash to immobilize the scene.
sentences.sContent_eng: Seven years later, through his work with Harold Eugene Edgerton of MIT, he made several photographic experiences of capturing sequences of actions using photoflash to immobilize the scene.
sentences.sCn: 7年以后，通过与麻省理工学院 Harold Eugene Edgerton的合作，他进行了几次摄影的尝试，捕捉一系列运动的场景通过闪光灯来使画面固定。

sentences.sContent: For photoflash , lug type, low loss factor and low leakage current.
sentences.sContent_eng: For photoflash , lug type, low loss factor and low leakage current.
sentences.sCn: 闪光灯用产品，具有低损耗，低漏电等特点。

sentences.sContent: For photoflash , lead wire type, small size, Low loss factor, high stability.
sentences.sContent_eng: For photoflash , lead wire type, small size, Low loss factor, high stability.
sentences.sCn: 闪光灯用引线式产品，体积小，损耗小，性能稳定。
